revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC2555W-AG |revision=2 |upc=662698587548 |ean= |asin=B000ICXRDW |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/16/2006 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=HED2555WAG2 |ic_id=3857A-2555WAG2 |pwr_v=5.1 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR5312A |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=smcadmin |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''EliteConnect Universal 2.4GHz/5GHz Wireless Access Point''' :[http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&cid=94&scid=95&localeCode=EN_USA&pid=1562 Product page] :[http://www.smc.com/files/AN/MN_SMC2555W-AG2.pdf Manual]
"P/N: 141610120005E R03" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Per the FCC manual, this device may have been sold by '''Edge-corE''' as the WA6102X-2.
Default credentials are per '''SMC''''s manual. :The default SSID for both bands may be '''SMC'''.
